snippet: NASA’s rover Curiosity has come up empty in its search for the gas methane on the red planet.
abstract: NASA’s rover Curiosity has so far come up empty in its search for gas methane, deflating hopes that microbial life forms are inhabiting soils of Mars.
lead_paragraph: NASA’s rover Curiosity has come up empty in its search for the gas methane on the red planet.

headline.seo: Hopes for Methane on Mars Deflated
headline.main: Hope of Methane on Mars Fades
headline.print_headline: Hope Of Methane On Mars Fades
